derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: probably from the resemblance of the side of the sole to a Plimsoll line

entry.def: Plimsolls are canvas shoes with flat rubber soles. People wear plimsolls for sports and leisure activities.

means.word_mean: 1. a light gym shoe with a rubber sole and a canvas top
